captures.author: @steipete
captures.text: I'm joining @OpenAI to bring agents to everyone. @OpenClaw is becoming a foundation: open, independent, and just getting started.
captures.whyInteresting: Massive news — OpenClaw creator steipete joining OpenAI. OpenClaw going open/independent.

captures.author: @damianplayer
captures.text: Mark Cuban's advice on selling AI agents to SMBs is the MOST underrated clip on the internet right now.
captures.whyInteresting: Actionable business advice on selling AI agents to SMBs — directly relevant to XPERIENCE.

captures.author: @aakashgupta
captures.text: NVIDIA just made every voice AI API a commodity. OpenAI charges $0.06/min input and $0.24/min output for Realtime API...
captures.whyInteresting: NVIDIA commoditizing voice AI pricing — huge implications for voice agent costs.

captures.author: @NoahEpstein_
captures.text: this is an unbelievable move by kimi. they dropped a model that's genuinely close to opus level at a fraction of the cost.
captures.whyInteresting: Kimi near-Opus model at fraction of cost — potential alternative for agent workloads.

captures.author: @cgtwts
captures.text: Kimi releases Kimi Claw: 40GB cloud space, 5,000+ community skills, works 24/7, pro-grade live data search, OpenClaw integration.
captures.whyInteresting: Kimi building browser-based OpenClaw workspace — signals platform growing fast.

captures.author: @heygurisingh
captures.text: Google just launched CodeWiki — paste your GitHub repo and it turns your codebase into navigable wiki.
captures.whyInteresting: Google CodeWiki — could be useful for documenting XPERIENCE and other repos.

captures.author: @openclaw
captures.text: OpenClaw 2026.2.15: Telegram message streaming, Discord Components v2, nested sub-agents.
captures.whyInteresting: Latest OpenClaw release — we should update. Telegram streaming + nested subagents.

captures.author: @pk_iv
captures.text: Really cool project. Auth is super annoying with browser agents and Anon was one of the best teams at handling it. Excited to see them open source.
captures.whyInteresting: Browser auth solution going open source — could solve auth pain for our agents.

captures.author: @robjama
captures.text: how Anthropic's marketing team uses claude code
captures.whyInteresting: Anthropic's own Claude Code workflow — sub-agents, memory, non-technical team usage.

captures.author: @CoFoundersNik
captures.text: Today, @steipete became the first confirmed one-person Unicorn! OpenClaw launched as a weekend side project less than 3 months ago.
captures.whyInteresting: One-person unicorn milestone — inspiring indie hacker story.

captures.author: @mfishbein
captures.text: Demolished 40 hours of weekly lead prospecting for a client. Built them this scraper with Claude Code and @browserbase.
captures.whyInteresting: Lead scraping with Claude Code + Browserbase — directly applicable to XPERIENCE outbound.

captures.author: @bloggersarvesh
captures.text: Claude + Local SEO is going to quietly create a bunch of business 'blue collar millionaires' this year.
captures.whyInteresting: Claude + local SEO for service businesses — exactly what XPERIENCE does.

captures.author: @heyrimsha
captures.text: Someone just built an AI coworker that actually remembers everything. Called Rowboat — builds knowledge graph from your work, runs locally.
captures.whyInteresting: Local knowledge graph tool — could complement our QMD memory system.

captures.author: @anothercohen
captures.text: We rolled out an AI chatbot inside Slack (OpenClaw), hooked up to everything...
captures.whyInteresting: Real-world OpenClaw deployment story — Slack integration, how work is changing.

captures.author: @getdelve
captures.text: AI agents just closed a SOC 2 audit in 19 days that should have taken months.
captures.whyInteresting: AI agents closing SOC 2 audits in 19 days — shows agents eating enterprise workflows.

captures.author: @johann_sath
captures.text: my OpenClaw backs itself up to GitHub every 2 hours. server dies? spin up a new one. full memory restored.
captures.whyInteresting: Good pattern — auto GitHub backup for OpenClaw. We should consider this.

captures.author: @DeRonin_
captures.text: 5 best and useful plugins for Claude Code: Superpowers, Frontend-design...
captures.whyInteresting: Claude Code plugin recommendations — worth checking for workflow improvements.
